item.title: CVE-2017-6888|2024-08-05T15:41:17.756Z -- flac -- flac
item.description: An error in the "read_metadata_vorbiscomment_()" function (src/libFLAC/stream_decoder.c) in FLAC version 1.3.2 can be exploited to cause a memory leak via a specially crafted FLAC file.
